changeSet.author: author
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO meeting_info (participant_limit, questions, speaking_level, topic) VALUES(3, 'Do you often go to job interview?;Do you like it?;What is the reason for you to go?;Do you use English for interview?;Have you ever interview another people?;What about the most interesting interview?;How was the most stressful interview?;Tell about the most strange interview?;How do you prepare yourself for interview?;What is your attitude to online interview?', 'PRE_INTERMEDIATE', 'Job interview1');
